name: MILLER ELECTRIC COMPANY v. Tate DEWEESE and Just-Mark, Inc. Petition of Tate Deweese; Miller Electric Company v. Tate Deweese and Just-Mark, Inc. v. Birmingham Bistro, Inc. Petition of Birmingham Bistro, Inc.; Miller Electric Company v. Tate Deweese and Just-Mark, Inc. Cross-Petition of Miller Electric Company

parties: MILLER ELECTRIC COMPANY v. Tate DEWEESE and Just-Mark, Inc. Petition of Tate Deweese. Miller Electric Company v. Tate Deweese and Just-Mark, Inc. v. Birmingham Bistro, Inc. Petition of Birmingham Bistro, Inc. Miller Electric Company v. Tate Deweese and Just-Mark, Inc. Cross-Petition of Miller Electric Company.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of July 2004, we DENY the Petition for Allowance of Appeal captioned at 483 WAL 2003, we GRANT the Petition for Allowance of Appeal captioned at 490 WAL 2003, and we DENY the Cross-Petition for Allowance of Appeal captioned at 520 WAL 2003.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
857 A.2d 183
MILLER ELECTRIC COMPANY v. Tate DEWEESE and Just-Mark, Inc. Petition of Tate Deweese. Miller Electric Company v. Tate Deweese and Just-Mark, Inc. v. Birmingham Bistro, Inc. Petition of Birmingham Bistro, Inc. Miller Electric Company v. Tate Deweese and Just-Mark, Inc. Cross-Petition of Miller Electric Company.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 22, 2004.
